title: MSACS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Blood Bank Lab Technician Posts
description: The Maharashtra State AIDS Control Society (MSACS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Blood Bank Counselors, ICTC Laboratory Technician, and ICTC Counsellor Jobs. Interseted and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th, DMLT, Any Degree, Post-graduation, B.Sc can apply for the MSACS Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. ...
